select q.su_model, q.su_brand, q.su_model, q.su_params, q.su_price, su_delivery, warranty, su_remark, su_total_price, s.supplier as supplier, i.model i_model,i.name i_name,i.number i_number,i.params i_params,i.sort i_sort,i.unit i_unit,i.real_brand i_real_brand, d.id spd_id from quote q left join inquiry i on q.inquiry_id=i.id left join sys_pro_detail d on d.id = i.pro_detail_id left join supply_supplier s on q.supplier_id = s.id
q.is_active = 1 and i.is_active=1 and d.is_active = 1
and q.supplier like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and d.id = #{proId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select q.*, i.model model,i.name name,i.number number,i.params params,i.unit unit,i.price price,i.total_price total_price,i.sort sort,i.veto veto, spc.id compare_id, spc.technical_audit technical_audit,spc.technical_remark technical_remark, spc.business_audit business_audit,spc.business_remark business_remark, spc.compare_audit compareStatus,spc.compare_remark compare_remark, spc.finally_audit finally_audit,spc.finally_remark finally_remark from inquiry i left join quote q on q.inquiry_id = i.id left join sys_pro_check spc on q.id = spc.quote_id
i.is_active= 1 and q.is_active = 1
and i.id = #{inquiryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
order by q.su_price asc
